attributes.action: All Parliamentary Political groups to form an Emergency Coalition Government.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure a full,frank and above all honest debate.Careful evaluation of serious issues before any action is taken from which there will be no return.Too clearly these past weeks we have seen what division,side-taking,personal ambition,lack of thought out policy,dishonesty and ambivalent Party leadership can do to damage our society in a very short space of time. Politicians must pull together and  be prepared to make hard decisions for the sake of future generations.
attributes.background: Following the damaging EU Referendum, cease internal disputes.Set aside cross party differences,serve the whole electorate,work together for the best outcome for all. We are leaderless at a time when we desperately need balanced,calm,intelligent,forward thinking policy to protect our Democracy.
